content: What 2001 film starring Audrey Tautou tells the story of a young woman who anonymously helps those around her, eventually finding love herself?

The 2001 film you're referring to is "Amélie" (also known as "Le Fabuleux Destin d'Amélie Poulain"). It stars Audrey Tautou as the title character, Amélie, who anonymously helps those around her and eventually finds love herself. The movie is a French romantic comedy-drama directed by Jean-Pierre Jeunet and was a critical and commercial success, earning multiple awards and nominations.
